elitePaths.highlight: Fifth night free on award stays and 35k/50k free night certificates from co-branded cards.
Milestone rewards every 10 nights with suite upgrade awards at 50 and 60 nights.
Automatic Gold status with select credit cards, unlocking free breakfast worldwide.

bookingTips: Compare cash rates versus points with a simple cents-per-point formula.
Stack portal rebates, Amex Offers, or Mastercard promos for paid stays when points value is low.
Keep a spreadsheet of upcoming certificate expirations so you can plan weekend getaways in advance.
